entry.title: Talk: OSINT From An Attacker's Perspective

link.title: Talk: OSINT From An Attacker's Perspective

entry.summary: The following is a recording of the first public talks I gave. It’s about OSINT, and it’s intended to be a very high level overview of the subject. This talk was given at ITAG, an Iowa IT conference. Video failed to load? Mega-list of resources mentioned in the talk: Creating an Effective Sock Puppet for OSINT Investigations - https://web.archive.org/web/20210125191016/https://jakec...

entry.title: Cloudgoat: Detection Evasion
entry.summary: The following is a link to a blog post about the “Detection Evasion” Cloudgoat scenario that I build while at Rhino Security Labs. https://web.archive.org/web/20220629153051/https://rhinosecuritylabs.com/cloud-security/cloudgoat-detection_evasion-walkthrough/ If you want to use Cloudgoat for practice, check out the github

entry.title: Cloudgoat: Vulnerable Lambda
entry.summary: The following is a link to a blog post about the “Vulnerable Lambda” Cloudgoat scenario that I build while at Rhino Security Labs. https://web.archive.org/web/20220525105450/https://rhinosecuritylabs.com/cloud-security/cloudgoat-vulnerable-lambda-functions/ If you want to use Cloudgoat for practice, check out the github
